input:
Use web search to find:
Starknet Sepolia testnet USDC token address official 2026
output:
Based on the search results, I found the official USDC token address for Starknet Sepolia testnet:

**0x053b40a647cedfca6ca84f542a0fe36736031905a9639a7f19a3c1e66bfd5080**

This address is documented in the official Starknet addresses repository on GitHub. The token has 6 decimals, which is standard for USDC.

Note: There are some discrepancies in documentation sources - Circle's developer docs list a different address (0x0512feAc...), but the starknet-io GitHub repository is the authoritative source for Starknet contract addresses.

You can obtain testnet USDC through Circle's faucet at https://faucet.circle.com/, which allows you to request testnet tokens for development purposes.

**Sources:**
- [starknet-addresses/bridged_tokens/sepolia.json at master · starknet-io/starknet-addresses](https://github.com/starknet-io/starknet-addresses/blob/master/bridged_tokens/sepolia.json)
- [Quickstart: Set up and transfer USDC on Starknet - Circle Docs](https://developers.circle.com/stablecoins/quickstart-setup-transfer-usdc-starknet)
- [Testnet Faucet | Circle](https://faucet.circle.com/)
- [Testnet Faucet - Sepolia Faucet by the Starknet Foundation](https://starknet-faucet.vercel.app/)

input:
Use web search to find:
landing page strategy gallery pricing table responsive design patterns 2026
output:
I found comprehensive information about landing page strategies and responsive pricing table design patterns for 2026. Here are the key insights:

## Key Design Trends for 2026

**Mobile-First Responsive Design**: Landing pages are now constructed with mobile as the priority - fast loading, adaptive layouts, thumb-friendly buttons, and minimalist content. Designers optimize for smaller screens first, then scale up.

**Minimalist, Focused Layouts**: The trend is toward clean designs that strip away unnecessary elements and distractions, drawing visitors' attention directly to the core message and CTA using generous whitespace, simple navigation, and a single prominent call-to-action.

**Bold Typography**: Expect oversized, expressive fonts paired with concise, high-impact headlines. Designers use micro-copy and strategic emphasis to deliver value propositions quickly.

## Responsive Design Patterns

- Customizable conversion-optimized responsive templates with drag-and-drop builders
- Adaptive layouts that work seamlessly across all screen sizes
- Platforms like Shopify include responsive design built-in

## Interactive Elements & Galleries

Screenshots are evolving into interactive components. Leading landing page examples feature:
- Embedded product previews
- Video demos
- Guided tours in the hero section
- Interactive showcases that demonstrate products before signup

## Pricing Table Strategies

Pricing pages are often the most visited (after the homepage) yet most overlooked pages. Best practices include:
- Clear comparison layouts
- Strategic feature highlighting
- Mobile-responsive table designs that stack or scroll horizontally

## Advanced Features for 2026

**Minimal Motion**: Meaningful animations including CTA button hover effects, scrolling content reveal with fade/slide animations, and animated feature icons.

**Top Landing Page Builders**: Landingi (300+ templates), Unbounce (AI-powered), Leadpages, and Swipe Pages (pricing: free tiers to $79+/month).

Sources:
- [12 Best Landing Page Builders in 2026 (Free & Paid)](https://www.emailvendorselection.com/best-landing-page-builders/)
- [Landing Page Design Trends by Industry (2026 Guide) | involve.me](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-design-trends)
- [20 Landing Page Examples That Actually Convert in 2026](https://www.superside.com/blog/landing-page-design-examples)
- [The 7 Best Landing Page Builders For 2026](https://www.searchenginejournal.com/the-7-best-landing-page-builders-for-2026/561935/)
- [10 Best Landing Page Designs in 2026 [Key Takeaways]](https://www.thethunderclap.com/blog/best-landing-page-designs)
- [10 Best Landing Page Design Examples for 2026 - Shopify](https://www.shopify.com/blog/landing-page-design)
- [Best SaaS Websites for Design Inspiration (2026) — Landing Page Examples](https://www.bookmarkify.io/blog/best-saas-websites-of-2025-end-of-year-showcase)
- [9 Landing Page Trends For 2026](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-trends)
- [10 SaaS Landing Page Trends for 2026 (with Real Examples) - SaaSFrame Blog](https://www.saasframe.io/blog/10-saas-landing-page-trends-for-2026-with-real-examples)

input:
Use web search to find:
Microsoft.Data.SqlClient latest version NuGet 2024
output:
Based on the search results, here's what I found about the latest version of Microsoft.Data.SqlClient on NuGet from 2024:

## Latest Version

The latest stable version is **Microsoft.Data.SqlClient 6.1.4**, which is available on NuGet.org.

## Key Information

- Microsoft.Data.SqlClient is the current data provider for SQL Server and Azure SQL databases
- System.Data.SqlClient is now deprecated, and Microsoft recommends transitioning to Microsoft.Data.SqlClient
- The package is actively maintained with regular security updates and bug fixes throughout 2024

## Installation

You can install it using any of these methods:

**Package Manager Console:**
```
Install-Package Microsoft.Data.SqlClient -Version 6.1.4
```

**.NET CLI:**
```
dotnet add package Microsoft.Data.SqlClient --version 6.1.4
```

**PackageReference in .csproj:**
```xml
<PackageReference Include="Microsoft.Data.SqlClient" Version="6.1.4" />
```

Sources:
- [NuGet Gallery | Microsoft.Data.SqlClient 6.1.4](https://www.nuget.org/packages/microsoft.data.sqlclient)
- [Download Microsoft SqlClient Data Provider for SQL Server - Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/connect/ado-net/download-microsoft-sqlclient-data-provider?view=sql-server-ver17)
- [Releases · dotnet/SqlClient](https://github.com/dotnet/sqlclient/releases)
- [Announcement: System.Data.SqlClient package is now deprecated](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/sqlserver/announcement-system-data-sqlclient-package-is-now-deprecated/4227205)

input:
Use web search to find:
OSWorld benchmark test suite download 369 tasks github 2026
output:
I found detailed information about the OSWorld benchmark test suite with 369 tasks.

## OSWorld Benchmark Test Suite

OSWorld is a benchmark consisting of **369 computer tasks** designed for testing multimodal agents in real computer environments. It was presented at **NeurIPS 2024** and involves real web and desktop apps in open domains, OS file I/O, and workflows spanning multiple applications across Ubuntu, Windows, and macOS.

### GitHub Repository & Download

The main repository is hosted at: **xlang-ai/OSWorld**

To download:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/xlang-ai/OSWorld.git
```

### Key Features

- **369 hand-crafted tasks** with 134 evaluation functions created by domain experts (~1800 person-hours)
- Supports single-app, multi-app, and open-domain workflows
- First-of-its-kind scalable, real computer environment for multimodal agents
- Supports task setup, execution-based evaluation, and interactive learning

### Quick Start

```bash
python quickstart.py
```

Or with custom VM settings:
```bash
python quickstart.py --provider_name vmware --path_to_vm "path/to/your/vm.vmx"
```

### Note on Task Count

While the full benchmark includes 369 tasks, 8 Google Drive-related tasks may encounter setup issues. You can either manually configure these 8 tasks or run 361 tasks instead - both approaches are officially acceptable.

Sources:
- [OSWorld: Benchmarking Multimodal Agents for Open-Ended Tasks in Real Computer Environments](https://os-world.github.io/)
- [GitHub - xlang-ai/OSWorld](https://github.com/xlang-ai/OSWorld)
- [OSWorld Benchmark Evaluation](https://www.emergentmind.com/topics/osworld-benchmark)
- [OSWorld Paper - NeurIPS 2024](https://proceedings.neurips.cc/paper_files/paper/2024/file/5d413e48f84dc61244b6be550f1cd8f5-Paper-Datasets_and_Benchmarks_Track.pdf)
- [arXiv:2404.07972 - OSWorld Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2404.07972)

input:
Use web search to find:
data pipeline ETL best practices 2025 October latest
output:
I found comprehensive information about data pipeline ETL best practices from 2025, including sources from October 2025.

## Key ETL Best Practices for 2025

### Modern Architecture Principles

**Modularity and Microservices**: Modern ETL frameworks are increasingly built using microservices architecture, where each stage (extract, transform, load) can be developed, deployed, and scaled independently for large datasets.

**Core Design Principles**:
- Modularity for flexible component updates
- Observability for monitoring and debugging
- Metadata-driven architecture
- Version control for all pipeline code
- Comprehensive error handling
- Pipeline testing at every stage

### Critical Best Practices

**1. Data Governance and Metadata Management**
Data governance, auditability, and debugging all depend on strong metadata management practices. This is foundational for maintaining data quality and compliance.

**2. Performance Optimization**
Organizations implementing proper ETL best practices report:
- 73% faster time-to-insight
- 45% reduction in data-related errors
- 5x faster data processing compared to traditional approaches

**3. Reliability and Error Handling**
ETL pipelines must be designed to handle errors, failures, and unexpected scenarios without disrupting data flow. This is critical as unplanned downtime costs an average of $5,600 per minute.

**4. Real-Time Capabilities**
Real-time ETL relies on event brokers like Kafka or Redpanda, where events are ingested, enriched, and transformed in-stream for immediate insights.

### Scalability Strategies

To scale data pipelines effectively:
- Add compute resources (horizontal or vertical scaling)
- Decouple pipeline stages for parallel execution
- Leverage cloud services for elasticity
- Implement parallel processing to execute multiple ETL processes concurrently

### Emerging Trends

**AI and Automation**: Modern ETL tools use automation and AI to detect errors, manage data flows, and support real-time insights, improving data quality and reducing manual intervention.

**ELT Over ETL**: Most modern data pipeline architectures favor ELT (Extract, Load, Transform) for better scalability and cloud performance.

### Business Impact

Optimized ETL pipelines deliver:
- 35-50% reduction in data processing costs
- 5x faster data processing
- 73% faster time-to-insight
- 45% reduction in data-related errors

Sources:
- [ETL Pipeline best practices for reliable data workflows | dbt Labs](https://www.getdbt.com/blog/etl-pipeline-best-practices)
- [ETL Pipeline Guide for 2025: Key Trends & Best Practices](https://kanerika.com/blogs/etl-pipeline/)
- [ETL Frameworks in 2025 for Future-Proof Data Pipelines | Integrate.io](https://www.integrate.io/blog/etl-frameworks-in-2025-designing-robust-future-proof-data-pipelines/)
- [ETL Pipeline: What it is, examples, and tools in 2025 - RisingWave](https://risingwave.com/blog/etl-pipeline-what-it-is-examples-and-tools-in-2025/)
- [ETL Pipelines: 5 Key Components and 5 Critical Best Practices | Dagster](https://dagster.io/guides/etl-pipelines-5-key-components-and-5-critical-best-practices)
- [Data Pipeline vs. ETL: The Definitive Guide for 2025](https://blog.skyvia.com/data-pipeline-vs-etl-pipeline/)
- [How to Build a Modern Data Pipeline | Best Practices | Matillion](https://www.matillion.com/learn/blog/how-to-build-a-data-pipeline)
- [ETL Best Practices - Peliqan](https://peliqan.io/blog/etl-best-practices/)
